commentBody:
I'm a long time Pats fan and this has been a strange week.

I guess what's stranger is the amount of surprise over the lack of information coming from the Patriots about what's happened.

Maybe the media and fans don't like it, but how can you argue with the approach?

Year after year, the Patriots are at the top of the league, always with a chance to go to the Super Bowl.

How many other teams can say the same?

And if you want to bring up the "cheat" in relation to the Patriots success, then all your admitting is that the Patriots have out-coached, out-prepared, out-executed better than your team, it's the truth.
